# Git Basic Workflow

## Getting a git repo

- Create a new repository:

    ```bash
    git init
    ```

- Clone an existing repository (and checkout the default branch):

    ```bash
    git clone <url>
    ```

::: {.fragment .fade-in .callout-note}
If you haven't done so yet, clone the repository for this course:

```bash
git clone git@github.com:njohner/git_hands_on.git
```
:::
